meta.title: Home - Mesquite ISD

figcaption.p: PLEASE SEE UPDATES USING THIS LINK: https://www.mesquiteisd.org/community/coronavirus-information-and-updates
Get detailed information on how we're doing more to ensure that after-school events remain safe and fun for everyone.

img.alt: Past seniors visit their elementary school to do the Senior walk.
Elementary students reading to each other.
Football player talking on bench with elementary school boy
MISD Superintendant serves veterans at the Veteran's Day breakfast.

section.class: fsElement fsPostElement fsList home-news fsThumbnailOriginal fsThumbnailSmall fsItemCount_4

div.a: Coronavirus (COVID-19): Important Information and District Updates
Mesquite ISD Announces Alternate Graduation Plans
Mesquite ISD Schools Closed for Remainder of 2019-20 School Year
NEW! Contact Your Child's Campus by Email

section.class: fsElement fsCalendar fsSlideshow homepage-events fsItemCount_10 fsSlideshowHorizontal

div.a: Last Day of School / Early Release - All Students

div.p: We believe in developing the talents, the confidence, and the creative genius of our people.
We envision a sense of belonging and empathy that inspires collaboration and loyalty.
At Mesquite ISD, we foster a collaborative environment that encourages curiosity through empowered learning.
We believe in the power of connection to strengthen our community. We believe in Mesquite!
Mesquite Independent School District | 3819 Towne Crossing | Mesquite | TX 75150 | Phone 972.288.6411
